resources.string:
Thank you for installing the ad-free version of %1$s!

Your aquariums have already been copied from the free version of the app. This will only happen once.

To prevent the free and paid versions of %1$s falling out of sync, it is strongly recommended you now uninstall the free version.

You can do this automatically by leaving the checkbox below checked, and pressing Continue.
Uninstall the free version of %1$s now
